descriptor.doc: The summary and the goal of the experiment.
A reference to a related publication or an associated document.
Information about the biological system from which samples were taken (e.g. the organism).
A key experimental variable or factor (e.g. time point in time series experiments or antibody in ChIP-Seq experiments). If used within a biosample, a value should be given per factor name.
Refers to a resource that was taken as sample within the experiment.
Refers to a resource that can be used to contrast two experimental variables or factors.
